StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMUDQCDate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgId as int = null
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
--- GET THE QC DATE BASED ON THE ORGID IF @OrgId IS NULL BEGIN SELECT ORG_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), QC_DATE,106) QC_DATE FROM MUD_QC_DATE END ELSE BEGIN SELECT ORG_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), QC_DATE,106) QC_DATE FROM MUD_QC_DATE WHERE ORG_ID = @OrgId
END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
